conversation.text: Based on your preference for poetry and a mysterious story, I would recommend 'The Wraith' (1986). It features a captivating plot involving a spirit descending from the sky and targeting a violent road-racing gang. Starring Randy Quaid and Clint Howard, this movie combines elements of mystery, action, and drama.
